gen:link.label:label: BV1108: The template S.26.07 – Solvency Capital Requirement - Simplifications, should be reported where S.06.02 is not reported if simplification for captives for market risk concentration in S.26.01 has been applied -->Template 1: S.01.01; Template 2: S.26.01; Expression: If {S.26.01, r0014,c0010}=[s2c_AP:x57] and ({S.01.01, r0140,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x2] or {S.01.01, r0140,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x22] or {S.01.01, r0140,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x23] or {S.01.01, r0140,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x63] or {S.01.01, r0140,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x67]) then ({S.01.01, r0560,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x1] or {S.01.01, r0560,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x60] or {S.01.01, r0560,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x71])

BV1108: The template S.26.07 – Solvency Capital Requirement - Simplifications, should be reported where S.06.02 is not reported if simplification for captives for market risk concentration in S.26.01 has been applied -->Template 1: S.01.01; Template 2: S.26.01; Expression: If {S.26.01, r0014,c0010}=[s2c_AP:x57] and ({S.01.01, r0140,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x2] or {S.01.01, r0140,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x22] or {S.01.01, r0140,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x23] or {S.01.01, r0140,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x63] or {S.01.01, r0140,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x67]) then ({S.01.01, r0560,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x1] or {S.01.01, r0560,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x60] or {S.01.01, r0560,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x71])
